title: [Pre-Order] APlusLift 20,000LB 2-Post Overhead Single Release Direct Drive Car Lift with 3 Year Warranty - AP-20SR
body_html:
All 2-Post Car Lifts

  • The product is expected to be delivered in about 60-90 days starting from the day the product is ordered. We require a 10% down (non-refundable) and the remaining balance paid before we ship it to your location. Please email us if you are interested.

  • Industry leading 3 YEAR WARRANTY (a $499 value!)

  • Single Point Safety Lock Release System

  • Two Set of 2 3/4" Tall and 5 1/2" Tall Truck Adapters Included; 6'7" Lift Height Maximum with Truck Adapters

  • CE Certified Lift Structure and Hydraulic System - Tested for 115% Dynamic Load Capacity and 150% Static Load Capacity

  • All Robot Welded Structure with Durable Powder Coated Finish

APlusLift AP-20SR is a 20000LB single point release overhead car lift (auto hoist) built with quality materials and good workmanship.

We are proud to offer an industry leading 3 year warranty for all parts (a $499 value)! We have all replacement and optional parts available for our lifts.

Free shipping to a commercial address (in a business zone) with forklift or a nearby freight terminal in the lower 48 states. Residential address has $60 additional charge. No liftgate service as the car lift package is too long. Please prepare your own unloading equipment such as a forklift, bobcat, cherrypicker, or flatbed truck to unload (We strongly recommend NOT to rent a forklift). Additional freight charges may apply for remote areas and high cost delivery areas.

Warehouse Pickup Locations (Contact Us for $500 Discount): Charlotte (NC), Chicago (IL), Dallas (TX), Jacksonville (FL), Kansas City (MO), Las Vegas (NV), Mobile (AL), Mansfield (OH), Portland (OR), Tacoma (WA), Virginia Beach (VA), and Watsontown (PA).

Frequently Asked Product, Order, and Shipping Questions and Technical Questions

Specifications
Model AP-20SR
(This Model)		 AP-14SR (for Comparison)
Manual AP-20SR Manual AP-14SR Manual
Style Overhead Overhead
Lock Release Single Point Release Single Point Release
Warranty 3 Years (36 Months) 3 Years (36 Months)
Lifting Capacity 20,000 LB 14,000 LB
Overall Height 170 13/32" 165 11/32"
Overall Width 155" 142 1/8"
Maximum Lift height with Truck Adapters 79 19/32" 79 19/32"
Maximum Lift height without Truck Adapters 74 3/32" 74 3/32"
Minimum Height of Adjustable Pads from Ground 6 5/32" 6 11/16"
Drive Through Width (Carriage to Carriage) 113 1/16" 104 1/8"
Column to Column Width 123 3/8" 114 11/16"
Column Cross Section 12 7/32"L x 11 13/16"W 12 7/32"L x 9 27/32"W
Shipping Weight 2900 LB 2300LB
Shipping package size 145 11/16"L x 32 11/16"W x28 15/16"H 149 5/8"L x 32 11/16"W x21 1/4"H
Column Steel Thickness 1/4" 1/4"
Carriage Steel Thickness 13/32" 1/4"
Carriage Yoke Thickness 13/32" 13/32"
Arm Steel Thickness 5/16" 5/16"
Base Plate Steel Thickness 25/32" 5/8"
Truck Adapters (Height Extensions) Two Sets:
4pcs: 5 1/2" Tall
4pcs: 2 3/4" Tall		 Two Sets:
4pcs: 5 1/2" Tall
4pcs: 2 3/4" Tall
Front Arms Straight Front 2 stages reach from 37" to 59 1/16" Straight Front 2 stages reach from 32 5/32" to 49 7/32"
Back Arms Straight Rear 2 stages reach from 37" to 59 1/16" Straight Rear 2 stages reach from 32 5/32" to 49 7/32"
Driving Mode Dual hydraulic cylinders, direct drive
Motor 220V Single Phase 3HP (recommend a 30A breaker)
Hydraulic Oil 5.3-6 gallons AW32/AW46 (Not Included)
Time to full rise 75 seconds
Arm Assembly Symmetrical Arm Assembly
Other Parts Included
  • 4 adjustable drop in pads
  • 10 anchor bolts
  • 10 shims
Optional Parts 2 3/4" and 6" Tall Truck Adapters
Concrete Requirement ≥13" thick
≥C25 strength
Model AP-20SR
(This Model)		 AP-14SR (for Comparison)

Features

  • Direct drive mode
  • Durable hydraulic system
  • Easy to operate and maintain
  • Single point safety lock release
  • Double Seal Rings Protecting PU Material
  • Carriage and Coloumn Material Q235B Steel
  • Lifting operation by pressing "UP" button on motor
  • Manual lowering operation by pressing lever
  • Relief valve built in power pump to prevent overloading
  • Automatic arm lock restraints
  • Relief valve built in power pump to prevent overloading
  • Door guards protection rubber
  • Up-limit switch to protect cylinders working stroke used in safe length scope
  • Heavy duty 3/8" diameter cable and 3" pulley that reduce high stress on synchronization process and increase cable life
  • Ultra high molecular self lubricating nylon slider that ensures carriage smooth moving up and down

All 2-Post Car Lifts
